Shade Omoniyi (amụrụ Folashade Omoniyi; 16 Eprel 1971), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Lepa Shandy, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri onyonyo Yoruba nke ndị mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa kọwara dị ka “onye ochie na otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Yoruba' Omoniyi's sobriquet Lepa Shandy bụ onye ọ na-eme ihe nkiri nwere otu aha.

Omoniyi bụ nwa afọ Osogbo na Osun Steeti mana a zụlitere ya na Lagos steeti ebe ọ gara Ire Akari Primary School wee nweta asambodo mbụ ya, wee gaa Isolo Comprehensive High School ebe ọ nwetara ụdị ule nke West African Senior School Certificate Examination
Omoniyi tinyere akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Lagos ma nabata ya ka ọ mụọ Nhazi data ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere B.Sc

Omoniyi malitere n'ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Naịjirịa n'afọ 1995. Na mbụ, ọ bụ onye nlereanya n'ihi ọdịdị ya dị ntakịrị wee mesịa bụrụ onye na-ese ihe maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri tupu ọ malite ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood nke Naijiria n'afọ 1996 ebe ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri na-asụ Bekee. Ọ malitere na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Breaking Point tupu ọ gbanwee gaa na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Yoruba nke Naijiria ebe ọ nwetara ọrụ ndu na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Lepa Shandy
Lepa Shandy bụ ihe nkiri Yoruba nke Naijiria nke Bayowa mepụtara ma mesịa bụrụ ọrụ na-aga nke ọma nke guzobere ntọala maka ọrụ Omoniyi.
Omoniyi mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ iri anọ na ise na 16 Eprel 2016 ma gosipụta ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ya akpọrọ Eri Ife Leyi n'otu ụbọchị ahụ na n'otu ebe ahụ o mere emume ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya
Ndị ọrụ ibe ya na onye bụbu First Lady nke Lagos Steeti, Abimbola Fashola gara ụbọchị ọmụmụ Omoniyi na onye isi ihe nkiri.
Omoniyi lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ.
